references.paper_title: NTU RGB+ D 120: A large-scale benchmark for 3d human activity understanding.
references.reason: This paper introduces the NTU RGB+D dataset, a large-scale benchmark used in the evaluated experiment.
This paper introduces the transformer-based diffusion models used as a core architecture.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis.
references.reason: This paper introduces rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis.
This paper introduces the technique of classifier-free diffusion guidance for improving the quality and diversity of generated images.

references.paper_title: Lora: Low-rank adaptation of large language models.
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a parameter-efficient transfer learning technique used for adapting pre-trained models.
